categories: Quick Link 9 Speed Chain Connector (2 Pack)
description: Oh snap! Replacement quick-connecting links for broken bike chains.Compatible with all 9-speed chains, including Shimano® HG and SRAM® chains.Not compatible with 6/7/8-speed or 10-speed chains.Include 2 quicklinks.
name: KMC Quick Link 9 Speed Chain Connector (2 Pack)
